mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHATROOM WHERE CL_NUM = #{cl_num} AND BP_ID = #{bp_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (SEQ_CHAT_MESSAGE.NEXTVAL, MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, MESSAGE_CONTENT, CHATROOM_ID, CL_NUM, BP_ID) VALUES(SEQ_CMESSAGE, #{mSender}, #{mReceiver}, #{mContent}, #{chatId}, #{cl_num}, #{bp_id})
mapper.select: SELECT A.CHATROOM_ID, A.MESSAGE_CONTENT, A.MESSAGE_SENDTIME, A.CL_NUM, B.BP_ID, B.HOS_NAME FROM (SELECT CHATROOM_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_SENDTIME, CL_NUM, BP_ID FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CHATROOM_ID ORDER BY MESSAGE_SENDTIME DESC) AS RANK, CHATROOM_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT,MESSAGE_SENDTIME, CL_NUM, BP_ID FROM CHATMESSAGE) SQ WHERE SQ.RANK = 1 AND CL_NUM = #{cl_num} ORDER BY CHATROOM_ID) A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM HOSPITAL UNION SELECT * FROM HAIR_SALON) B ON A.BP_ID = B.BP_ID
SELECT MESSAGE_SENDER, MESSAGE_RECEIVER, MESSAGE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(MESSAGE_SENDTIME, 'YYMMDD HH24:MI') MESSAGE_SENDTIME, CL_NUM, BP_ID FROM CHATMESSAGE WHERE CHATROOM_ID=#{chatId}
SELECT M.*, B.BP_ID FROM CHATMESSAGE M LEFT OUTER JOIN BUSINESS_PARTNER B ON M.MESSAGE_SENDER = B.BP_ID WHERE CHATROOM_ID=#{chatId}
SELECT * FROM CHATMESSAGE M WHERE CHATROOM_ID = #{chatId} ORDER BY MESSAGE_ID DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHATMESSAGE WHERE CL_NUM = #{cl_num} AND MESSAGE_SENDTIME = NULL AND CHATROOM_ID=#{chatId};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHATMESSAGE WHERE BP_ID = #{bp_id} AND MESSAGE_SENDTIME = NULL AND CHATROOM_ID=#{chatId};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHATMESSAGE WHERE (BP_ID=#{bp_id} AND MESSAGE_SENDER ^=#{cl_num})) OR (CL_NUM=#{cl_num} AND MESSAGE_SENDER ^=#{CL_NUM})
